official_title: A bill to prohibit the displacement of the residents of the Lakefront Properties in Chicago, Illinois.

summary.text: Lakefront Properties Tenant Protection Act - States that the rehabilitation of the Lakefront Properties in Chicago, Illinois, shall be carried out in accordance with a specified memorandum of accord entered into by the Chicago Housing Authority and the Lakefront Community Organization.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the displacement of the residents of the Lakefront Properties in Chicago, Illinois.
